name: Curry
description: Choice of meat: White meat chicken, beef, tofu, vegetable, no meat.
additional: Shrimp $2.50, Combination(shrimp, beef, and chicken) add $2.50, Steamed Rice $2.50/ Brown Rice $3.00

items.name: Red Curry
items.description: Bamboo shoots, bell pepper and sweet basil in red curry sauce.

items.name: Yellow Curry
items.description: Potatoes, carrot, and onion in yellow curry sauce.

items.name: Panang Curry
items.description: Bell pepper, peas, and carrot in mild red curry sauce.

items.name: Green Curry
items.description: Rich and smooth with a tast of coconut, bell pepper, bamboo shoots and basil.

items.name: Massaman Curry
items.description: Onion, potatoes, carrot and peanuts in special Massaman curry sauce.

items.name: Pineapple Curry
items.description: Pineapple, tomatoes, bell pepper & sweet basil in red curry sauce.

items.name: Choo Chee Salmon
items.description: Grilled salmon in mild red curry sauce with bell peppers and basil. Served with steamed white rice.

items.name: Fried Fish in Curry Sauce
items.description: Crispy deep-fried fish topped with red curry sauce and basil.
